LanguageData.ArachnaeQueen_Race.label: Arachne Queen
LanguageData.ArachnaeQueen_Race.description: The Arachne Queen is the only individual in the Arachne Hive capable of giving birth to Druids and is the core of the Hive's consciousness pyramid, bearing the great mission of leading the Arachne swarm forward. The swarm consciousness network formed by her psionic link with her subordinates allows the swarm to operate with extremely high efficiency; however, if the Queen dies, all of her swarm will perish!
